Biostatistics Chapter 1 General overview 1.1 Introduction 1.2 Example dataset

Biostatistics David Coffey 2018-06-29 Chapter 1 General overview 1.1 Introduction This books provides a consise overview of biostatistics and its applications using the R programming language. The textbook Fundamentals of Biostatitics (Rosner 2016) was used extensivity in the preparation of this book. 1.2 Example dataset Examples of R functions are performed on a dataset of patients with newly diagnosed multiple myeloma. This dataset contains a variety of categorical and continuous variables.
